review: I like the Fire Stick and it has become our primary device for streaming.  It works best with Amazon content, but as a Prime member that is not a downside.  Netflix also worked rather well.  For me the biggest drawback is that Vudu is missing from their app lineup.  If your looking for a modestly priced streaming device this is worth considering.
